job.name: populate weekly results
job.command: tdsql -H 10.20.88.35 -u vparonyan -p LetsDoTDWC12 " insert into sandbox.kb_seo_deal_inventory_weekly(datekey, url, deal_count, merchant_count, merchant_with_desc) select @parameter_start_dt, url, cast(sum(deal_count) as decimal(10,2))/7 as deal_count, cast(sum(merchant_count) as decimal(10,2))/7 as merchant_count, cast(sum(merchant_with_desc) as decimal(10,2))/7 as merchant_with_desc from sandbox.kb_seo_deal_inventory where cast('@parameter_date' as Date)-7 < cast(datekey - 19000000 as Date format 'yyyy-mm-dd') and cast('@parameter_date' as Date)+1 > cast(datekey - 19000000 as Date format 'yyyy-mm-dd') group by url; "
